title: Green Beans with Tomato and Pancetta Sauce
titleAlternative: Fagiolini con Salsa di Pomodori e Pancetta
introduction: Green Beans with Tomato and Pancetta Sauce is a delightful side dish that pairs wonderfully with a frittata or omelet, combining savory pancetta with fresh green beans and ripe tomatoes for a truly flavorful experience.
ingredients: 2 large ripe tomatoes, peeled, seeded, and chopped
instructions: Prepare the beans as described in step 1 of the Green Beans with Pancetta and Onion recipe, but do not cut them into pieces.

In a medium saucepan, cook the pancetta and garlic in the oil over medium heat until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in the tomatoes, rosemary, and salt and pepper to taste. Bring to a simmer and cook 10 minutes.
Stir the beans into the sauce and cook until heated through, about 5 minutes. Remove the rosemary. Serve hot.
